title: r/Prorevenge Steal My Pills? I'll Swap My Pills With LAXATIVES!
description: r/Prorevenge OP is a medical condition that requires him to take prescription medication. His two roommates think that it's a good idea to start taking OP's very important medication. No problem! OP can just swap out his medication with high-powered laxatives and wait until the sh** hits the fan, so to speak. His roommates spend the night glued to the toilet and learn a valuable lesson about stealing things from others!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
